name: Caterkiller
description:
Caterkiller is a short, rage inducing remake of Wii Tanks full of bugs (caterpillars) and bugs (the game dev kind). I challenged myself to make a game in a week and Caterkiller is the result.  There are definitely plenty of bugs to fix and features I did not get to add, but I am happy with how much I managed to finish!

Use WASD to move around, left click to shoot, and right click to drop a mushroom bomb.

Special thanks to Julia for making the music!
